name: Erebos (steamknight)
description:
As you wake up from cryo, you quickly realize that something's amiss on board the Erebos. It's up to you to figure it out and stay alive. Can you get all 6 endings?!

Made for the PIGSquad#summerslowjams

While it can play in the browser, the download version is probably a better experience. I have supplied OSX and Linux versions, but they are untested and may not work. Please let me know.

**A huge thank you to everyone who supported me while trying to do this. I could not have done it without you.**

Known issues

There undoubtedly more bugs, if you find any please let me know.

  • When you return to the main menu, for some reason the controller no longer works for selecting a menu option, you'll have to use the keyboard, the controller then starts working again in game.
  • When you reload the checkpoint, regardless of whether you turned on the engine before, it will be off and needs to be turn on again.
